Deliver Better

We make food deliveries more convenient, secure, and manageable.

The Veranda Solution To

The Most Inconvenient Convenience

Waiting around for deliveries is a hassle, and leaving packages outside makes them vulnerable to theft or spoiling. If only getting deliveries was as easy as ordering them.

Introducing Veranda, the world’s most sensible delivery system.

The Veranda System Is

A Seamless Delivery Experience

Veranda Box

Deliveries finally have a home in your Veranda. The box is fitted with a smart lock to keep your packages safe from theft, sensors to keep you in the know, and thermal insulation to keep perishables protected from spoiling.

Veranda Dashboard

Stay in control of your deliveries with the Veranda Dashboard. Check the status of your orders, control your Veranda Box, set locking schedules or share access with others. Simply connect all your online merchants and let Veranda handle the rest.

If it’s between hectic grocery shopping and being stuck at home waiting for deliveries,
  we’d choose neither. 

Veranda Features Include

Thinking Outside The Box

Designed With Your Home In Mind

Well-designed in both form and function, this handsome box sits outside of your house without drawing too much attention to itself. Tailor it to your look by picking one of the many available colour options. The Box lasts up to a year on one set of AA batteries, and uses modern wireless technologies so you can secure the box anywhere around your house without worrying about power or WiFi connectivity.

Keeps Your Deliveries Fresh & Safe

To ensure the quality of the food placed in the box, it features insulation and sensors to keep your perishables from, well, perishing. Pairing this with the remotely accessed lock is a sure way to keep the right people in and the wrong people or animals out. And if anything is ever out of the ordinary, you'll be notified immediately.

As Smart As It Looks

Between the dashboard and the box, the Veranda System is the ultimate online order organizer. Veranda keeps track of all the deliveries from your favourite merchants, automatically unlocks itself, and keeps you notified on it's status. Using the Veranda Dashboard, you have full management of the box, can see what's been delivered, check the temperature, share access, and more, all conveniently from your smartphone.

Veranda's Environmental Impact

Unattended deliveries, day or night, mean more efficient routes and fewer vehicles on the road, significantly reducing the overall carbon footprint of your groceries.

Current Product Development Status

Testing, prototyping, and testing some more
